text: Largest breakfast menu I've ever seen and the staff are very friendly and remember us each time we go. Highly recommend this place!

This is by far my favorite breakfast joint. 

Very casual and unpretentious, with friendly service, they have the BIGGEST breakfast menu I've ever seen. Prices are reasonable, variety is incredible and portions are large. Most of all, the food is great!

Change from the big restaurant chains with unoriginal menus and try this instead!

I found this place for breakfast and I liked it. 
Clean restaurant
Waitress is super nice
Food is yummy and fresh
Price are good
I am definitely coming back here
Great breakfast, crepes are so good and the wraps are amazing
